title: The Consequence of Judging Others by Appearance - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Carefree Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cute Protagonist   Divination   Doting Love Interests   Feng Shui   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't   Sickly Characters   Strong to Stronger   Stubborn Protagonist   Wealthy Characters
author: Butterfly's Shadow Beneath the Moon   Yue Xia Die Ying   月下蝶影
description: Qi Yan had always been dissatisfied with two things about himself. One was that his name was not mighty, and the other was that his appearance was even less mighty. However, all that did not prevent him from embarking on the broad road of a Feng Shui master.>
